analysis.key_quote: I am writing in strong opposition to any proposal that seeks to reclassify federal civil servants under a new employment category that removes long-standing merit-based protections—such as the now-revoked Schedule F.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about the removal of merit-based protections and due process rights, as well as the potential for politicization of the civil service. It emphasizes the importance of a stable, nonpartisan civil service, which aligns with the themes of integrity and professionalism.
